item.title: Non-Linear Programming: A Multiple Data Set Approach
item.description: Author: Ed Orlando Introduction & Problem Statement We have all been there. You are at the end of the school semester and the only thing left to do is take that dreaded final exam. If you were like me, you would calculate the minimum exam score needed to receive a certain grade. For example, you might be able to score a 70% on your History exam and still get a B in the class.
